subject: FORMAL NOTICE: EU Right of Withdrawal - Order #SSN2868 - New Ticket
description_text:
Dear Simonns Team,

I am opening this new ticket as I have not received a response on my
previous communication regarding my cancellation, and the original ticket
appears to be closed or ignored.

Please find below the formal declaration of my Right of Withdrawal, which
was originally sent today at 13:04:

Dear Simonns Team,


I am contacting you regarding my recent order
#SSN2868
which is currently marked as “confirmed” but not shipped. I requested a
cancellation earlier, but my request was refused on the basis that the
order is “already shipping.”


Under EU consumer protection law (Directive 2011/83/EU on consumer rights),
I am exercising my right of withdrawal, which allows me to cancel any
online order within 14 days of receiving the goods — regardless of shipping
status. Since the item has not yet been delivered, my cancellation is fully
valid and must be accepted.


Please confirm the cancellation of my order and issue a full refund to my
original payment method.

If you have already created a shipment label, please note that this does
not void my right of withdrawal unless the item has physically been handed
to the carrier.


Thank you for confirming the cancellation and refund within the next 24
hours.


Kind regards,

Simon Berger

Please confirm you have processed the cancellation and initiated a full
refund to my original payment method. As stated, I will be refusing
delivery of the package, and I expect the refund to be processed promptly
upon your re-receiving the item, in line with the EU legal requirement of
14 days from my notice.

conversations.body_text: Hi Simon Berger,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped. Please note that our return policy does not apply unless the product has a quality issue. Should you still wish to return the item, we can provide the address of our German warehouse. You would be responsible for shipping the package back to our warehouse at your own expense. Thank you for your understanding.

Dear Simsonn Team,

Thank you for your reply. Please note that your stated position violates
mandatory EU consumer law and is rejected entirely.

Right of Withdrawal: As a consumer purchasing at a distance, I have a
non-negotiable 14-day Right of Withdrawal under the EU Consumer Rights
Directive (2011/83/EU), which allows me to cancel without providing any
reason. Your internal policy requiring a "quality issue" is legally void
and unenforceable against this statutory right.

Refund Obligation: The contract was legally terminated upon my notice of
withdrawal on [Date of your first cancellation message].
Return Logistics: As previously stated, I will refuse delivery of the
package, thereby fulfilling my obligation to return the goods.

You are legally obligated to issue a full refund within 14 days of my
withdrawal notice, or upon re-receiving the goods.

I now require you to immediately initiate a full refund. If I do not
receive confirmation of the refund initiation within 24 hours, I will be
left with no choice but to:

Lodge a formal complaint with the relevant European  Consumer Centre (ECC)
for your country due to your failure to comply with Directive 2011/83/EU.
Initiate a chargeback dispute with my payment provider, providing them with
the evidence of my formal withdrawal and your explicit refusal to honor my
statutory EU rights.

I expect compliance with the law.


Kind regards,

Simon Berger



service@simsonn.com

​​​​​Dear Mr. Berger,  Thank you for your message. Please rest assured that we fully comply with all applicable EU consumer protection laws, including the Right of Withdrawal under Directive 2011/83/EU.  If you wish to return the product without reason, we will, of course, accept the return in accordance with the law. However, you will need to cover the return shipping costs to our German warehouse. Once the returned package is received, we will process a full refund promptly.  Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.  Kind regards, The Simsonn Team

Dear Simsonn Team,

Thank you for confirming your compliance with the EU Right of Withdrawal
(Directive 2011/83/EU).

As the item was never accepted by me (due to my prior cancellation notice)
and the contract is cancelled, I must be fully refunded the price of the
product plus the original outgoing shipping cost (standard shipping), as
required by EU law.

To expedite the full resolution of this matter and waive the need for a
formal dispute, I propose the following:

I will accept liability for the return shipping cost (incurred when I
refuse the package) IF AND ONLY IF you confirm you will fully refund the
original outgoing shipping cost to my payment method.

In summary: I pay for the return, you pay for the original delivery.

Please confirm immediately that you agree to this resolution and that you
will initiate the full refund (product price + original shipping cost)
within 24 hours.

If I do not receive this confirmation, I will proceed with filing a formal
complaint with the European Consumer Centre (ECC) and initiating a
chargeback dispute, using the documentation that clearly shows your failure
to honor the full refund of shipping costs mandated by EU law.

Kind regards,

Simon Berger


service@simsonn.com
We agree to follow this procedure. We will issue a full refund once you return the package to our warehouse. Please rest assured.
